main.name: Ebuka Isiadinso
main.description: I love coding both as a hobby and profession
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ebuka! I started coding in 2019. I've worked with startups to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey, I realised my passion existed in leading others towards their dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I have now launched an online platform that, though in beta version, would welcome all types of developers, including those with no experience, to improve their coding practices.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the DecipherCode!

education.description: Graduated with Second Class Divison One Honours

work.title: Founder
work.description: Aims to help upcoming developers understand codes. Building DecipherCode as large as possible.

work.title: QA Analyst
work.description: In charge of writing bug tests to help clients report any problem concerning their websites, app or web tools before they are released to public.

work.title: Junior Full Stack Engineer
work.description: Worked with Senior JavaScript Developer to write unit tests using Jest and Enzyme, ensuring that all web UIs are shipped without issues. Created a shop UI using ReactJS and Sass which provided users an interface to browse some of the listed products.

testimonials.text: Ebuka is a self-motivated and hard-working young person, he has a very good career development strategy and shows a lot of initiatives.
